titleStmt.title: Letter from Donald G. Darnell to John G. Neihardt, January 20, 1971
titleStmt.author: Darnell, Donald G.

publicationStmt.authority: The Papers of John G. Neihardt

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Letter from Donald G. Darnell to John G. Neihardt, January 20, 1971

msIdentifier.repository: John G. Neihardt Center Research Library, Aly Collection

div1.fw:
LINCOLN PUBLIC SCHOOLS JOHN PRASCH, SUPERINTEDENT LINCOLN SOUTHEAST HIGH SCHOOL BOARD OF EDUCATION OF LINCOLN NEBRASKA. COMMON SCHOOLS THE HOPE OF OUR COUNTRY.
Dr. Wesley V. Lauterbach, Principal Mr. Rex Mercer, Vice Principal Mr. Donald G. Darnell, Asst. Principal Student Affairs Mr. David Myers, Asst. Principal Instruction PHONE-402-488-2349 Mailing Address: 2930 South 37th Street Lincoln, Nebraska 68506
div1.p: The Lincoln Southest Faculty and Student Council are very pleased that you will speak at the Honors Convocation on Tuesday, February 23, 1971.

During the second semester of each school year, we have an assembly to recognize those students who, by their superior scholastic performance have earned a place on the Honor Roll. Also, at this time we award membership in National Honor Society to those seniors who qualify in the areas of scholarship, leadership, character, and service.

Immediately after the Honors Assembly, we have arranged to have an assembly for the English classes. At that time, and if you feel up to it, we would appreciate it if you would speak to these students.
Prior to the Honors Convocation, a coffee hour will be held in the cafeteria for parents and faculty, from 8:00 to 8:45 a.m. If possible, we would like to have you attend the coffee.

Upon your arrival, you will be greeted by Michael Shuptar, a member of the Lincoln Southeast Student Council. HONORS CONVOCATION SCHEDULE Place: Lincoln Southeast High School Auditorium Date: Tuesday, February 23, 1971 Coffee Hour: 8:00 to 8:45 a. m. Convocation: 8:00 to 10:00 a. m. Dr. Neihardt: Will speak from 9:00 to 9:15 SPECIAL ASSEMBLY FEATURING DR. NEIHARDT Place: Lincoln Southeast High School Auditorium Date: Tuesday, February 23, 1971 Dr. Neihardt: Will speak to English classes from 10:00 to 10:30 a. m.

closer.note: Donald G. Darnell Assistant Principal Student Services
